content.about:
Prestige Estate Services – San Antonio Team provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Fine art • Jewelry • Furniture • Collectibles • IRS estate tax compliance  
Certifications: ISA. With Decades combined experience [1] experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the San Antonio area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Karen J.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and Prestige Estate Services – San Antonio Team delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: David T.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and Prestige Estate Services – San Antonio Team delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Emily W.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: John R.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

specialties:

reviews.author: David J.

reviews.author: Susan J.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Sarah W.
